ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He who has fear will be reminded;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He who fears (Allah) shall heed it,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Those who have fear of God will benefit
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Soon whoever fears will heed advice.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: The reminder will be received by him who fears,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and he who fears shall remember,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He who fears [God] will heed the reminder,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Admonished is he indeed who feareth,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: he who fears [God] will take admonition,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: The admonition will be received by those who fear (Allah):
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: The reminder will be received by him who fears (Allah),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and he who fears shall remember,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He who fears [Allah] will be reminded.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [87:10] He who fears, God, exalted be He, will be reminded, by it, as in the verse: So admonish by the Qur’ān him who fears My threat [Q. 50:45];
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He will heed) he will take admonition by means of the Qur'an and through Allah (who feareth) Allah, i.e. the Muslim,
